content.question: Which of the following was one likely purpose of the decree?

choices.label: To discourage the British from invading Spanish Florida
To resettle Black people in Spanish colonies in Africa
To end the institution of slavery in the Spanish Empire
To protect Black people from Spain’s European rivals

content.answer: To protect Black people from Spain’s European rivals
